paragraphs.content: Set the trumpet to thy mouth. He shall come as an eagle against the house of the LORD, because they have transgressed my covenant, and trespassed against my law.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Set the trumpet to thy mouth. He shall come as an eagle against the house of the Lord, because they have transgressed my covenant, and trespassed against my law.

paragraphs.content: Israel shall cry unto me, My God, we know thee.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Israel shall cry unto me, My God, we know thee.

paragraphs.content: Israel hath cast off the thing that is good: the enemy shall pursue him.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Israel hath cast off the thing that is good: the enemy shall pursue him.

paragraphs.content: They have set up kings, but not by me: they have made princes, and I knew it not: of their silver and their gold have they made them idols, that they may be cut off.
paragraphs.contentHtml: They have set up kings, but not by me: they have made princes, and I knew it not: of their silver and their gold have they made them idols, that they may be cut off.

paragraphs.content: ¶ Thy calf, O Samaria, hath cast thee off; mine anger is kindled against them: how long will it be ere they attain to innocency?
paragraphs.contentHtml: ¶ Thy calf, O Samaria, hath cast thee off; mine anger is kindled against them: how long will it be ere they attain to innocency?

paragraphs.content: For from Israel was it also: the workman made it; therefore it is not God: but the calf of Samaria shall be broken in pieces.
paragraphs.contentHtml: For from Israel was it also: the workman made it; therefore it is not God: but the calf of Samaria shall be broken in pieces.

paragraphs.content: For they have sown the wind, and they shall reap the whirlwind: it hath no stalk: the bud shall yield no meal: if so be it yield, the strangers shall swallow it up.
paragraphs.contentHtml: For they have sown the wind, and they shall reap the whirlwind: it hath no stalk: the bud shall yield no meal: if so be it yield, the strangers shall swallow it up.

paragraphs.content: Israel is swallowed up: now shall they be among the Gentiles as a vessel wherein is no pleasure.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Israel is swallowed up: now shall they be among the Gentiles as a vessel wherein is no pleasure.

paragraphs.content: For they are gone up to Assyria, a wild ass alone by himself: Ephraim hath hired lovers.
paragraphs.contentHtml: For they are gone up to Assyria, a wild ass alone by himself: Ephraim hath hired lovers.

paragraphs.content: Yea, though they have hired among the nations, now will I gather them, and they shall sorrow a little for the burden of the king of princes.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Yea, though they have hired among the nations, now will I gather them, and they shall sorrow a little for the burden of the king of princes.

paragraphs.content: Because Ephraim hath made many altars to sin, altars shall be unto him to sin.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Because Ephraim hath made many altars to sin, altars shall be unto him to sin.

paragraphs.content: I have written to him the great things of my law, but they were counted as a strange thing.
paragraphs.contentHtml: I have written to him the great things of my law, but they were counted as a strange thing.

paragraphs.content: They sacrifice flesh for the sacrifices of mine offerings, and eat it; but the LORD accepteth them not; now will he remember their iniquity, and visit their sins: they shall return to Egypt.
paragraphs.contentHtml: They sacrifice flesh for the sacrifices of mine offerings, and eat it; but the Lord accepteth them not; now will he remember their iniquity, and visit their sins: they shall return to Egypt.

paragraphs.content: For Israel hath forgotten his Maker, and buildeth temples; and Judah hath multiplied fenced cities: but I will send a fire upon his cities, and it shall devour the palaces thereof.
paragraphs.contentHtml: For Israel hath forgotten his Maker, and buildeth temples; and Judah hath multiplied fenced cities: but I will send a fire upon his cities, and it shall devour the palaces thereof.
